text: so at Nika this is a short and sweet
summary of how to make pineapple fried
rice for the full version please click
on the link in the description let's get
started start out by searing half your
shrimp until they're cooked and set them
aside then cut up the other half of your
shrimp into small pieces and cook them
until done set them aside as well in the
same pan add a little more oil if needed
and then add one egg scramble it
slightly and when it's halfway done at
the rice mix it all up add some diced
onion and mix that up as well
then add curry powder white pepper sugar
and salt then fish sauce soy sauce and
the optional shrimp paste mix it up
really well when everything is mixed up
at cashews pineapple and the small
pieces of shrimp toss just to heat
everything through and dry off the rice
turn off the heat and stir in seeded
tomatoes and green onions and it's ready
to plate you can serve the rice on a
nice plate or in a pineapple bowl if you
want serve with some cucumber slices as
a palate cleanser then top it off with
our whole shrimp and enjoy
for the details of this recipe and tips
for successful fried rice you can click
here to watch the full version cop-con
car
